Topic.Title: SunTrust to sell $1.2 bln worth of Coca-Cola shrs

Message.Msg: The only reason they are selling is to re-coup some of their losses from bad real estate deals and protect their own share price. The Coke secret formula was stored in a Sun Trust valut before being moved to the Coke museum. Sun Trust is a long time Coke supporter.

Message.Title: Political junkie alert
Message.Msg: This November watch Michigan and Florida. That is where the election hangs.

Message.Title: KO is a buy
Message.Msg: KO is a buy, the stock should start moving up, leaving the bottom. Expect next week to see substantial gains in the share price. Strong BUY
